title: Failure in #1423 is due AnnexRepo.get() leaking progress info in return JSON

labels.name: more-info-needed
labels.description: Key information is missing in order to efficiently tackle the issue

body:
Result of getting a single file looks like this in PY3:

````
[{'total-size': 13702811, 'percent-progress': '13.84%', 'byte-progress': 1896448, 'action': {'file': 'sub-01/anat/sub-01_T1w.nii.gz', 'note': 'from mddatasrc...', 'key': 'MD5E-s13702811--21c3c396e96b308b021b5754afa5518c.nii.gz', 'command': 'get'}},
{'total-size': 13702811, 'percent-progress': '36.47%', 'byte-progress': 4997120, 'action': {'file': 'sub-01/anat/sub-01_T1w.nii.gz', 'note': 'from mddatasrc...', 'key': 'MD5E-s13702811--21c3c396e96b308b021b5754afa5518c.nii.gz', 'command': 'get'}},
{'total-size': 13702811, 'percent-progress': '59.04%', 'byte-progress': 8089600, 'action': {'file': 'sub-01/anat/sub-01_T1w.nii.gz', 'note': 'from mddatasrc...', 'key': 'MD5E-s13702811--21c3c396e96b308b021b5754afa5518c.nii.gz', 'command': 'get'}},
{'total-size': 13702811, 'percent-progress': '81.63%', 'byte-progress': 11186176, 'action': {'file': 'sub-01/anat/sub-01_T1w.nii.gz', 'note': 'from mddatasrc...', 'key': 'MD5E-s13702811--21c3c396e96b308b021b5754afa5518c.nii.gz', 'command': 'get'}},
 {'file': 'sub-01/anat/sub-01_T1w.nii.gz', 'success': True, 'note': 'checksum...', 'key': 'MD5E-s13702811--21c3c396e96b308b021b5754afa5518c.nii.gz', 'command': 'get'}]
````

The only actual result is the last item.
